DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal retrospective study evaluate male breast cancer patient population Summa Health System/Akron City Hospital period 18 year compare finding historical data . The objective : - identify risk factor . - evaluate stage histology time presentation . - document treatment modality outcomes . - analyze outcome comparison historical data .
